Yes the gun is separated from the craft.

Wait I'll prepare the pics, including the T-95's 3 tries each.

I cannot record video, so I resorted to manually capturing every frame by screenshots (tedious I know ,sorry for the quality. I have an entire collection that could be compiled into a video and only selected the best ones)

First Try: I hit the bridge on the front section. She was cut in half and was devastated. (How could hitting the bridge result that?!?!)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Second Try: I hit the the center/mid section. She stretched, but no damage. (Meh not that much she's pretty tough)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Third Try: I hit the mid section from a higher angle. She's damaged but still floats. (will sink eventually if this was real LOL)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I apologize for not posting my turn, but I have been rather busy as of late (wonderful end-of-semester fun-time) and, though I have attempted to complete my turn repeatedly, it keeps glitching out and forcing me to start over...Also, hopefully we do not have to reset everything for 0.90.

Problem: 0.90.0. sorry for multipost. I dont have 0.90 yet though

I just got 0.90. I didn't test our persistent to see if there is anything messed up by the update, but I don't think there will be since the majority of new features were in career mode, plus the Mk3 parts. Neither of those will affect the ships already in place. I still have a copy of 0.25 if it's a problem for Zamo to update.

Could Script or Zamo please replace their ships in the file ej provided?

Yup. you guys better restart from mine. also, its the end of my school as well. in the usa, you would call it middle school. today was the last day. I was running all the way back home pulling the finger at the school. Moving on to high school next year.

Are you people willing to wait for me? I have to update my ship cause it was built in 0.24 but it might be the cause of the error on the 0.25 version when i uploaded my ship. plus there is 0.90 now I have to rebuild my ship from scratch.
we are using 0.25 for this battle. just change the version number in the ships .craft file to 0.25.0 and it should work.

we are using 0.25 for this battle. just change the version number in the ships .craft file to 0.25.0 and it should work.
